snippet.title: Spellbreak | Chapter 3: The Wardens Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A strange and powerful threat has awakened in Chapter 3: The Wardens! Outmaneuver your foes using the revamped movement system, explore transformed Dominions across the Hollow Lands, and battle an invasion of ancient automatons imperiling all of existence.

CHAPTER 3 FEATURES:
* Dynamic Movement Changes: Show your skill with the new dodge mechanic and experience faster-paced and more reactive movement.
* Transformed Dominions: Combat zones in Dominion mode have been reworked with the new movement changes in mind…and Banehelm now has a magnificent library! 
* Introducing the Wardens: An invasion of ruthless automatons has been awakened and they will stop at nothing to eliminate all life in the Hollow Lands!
* Plus: Quality of life changes including Color Accessibility and the introduction of cosmetic loadouts by class, balance adjustments, bug fixes, and more!

---

Spellbreak is a free multiplayer action-spellcasting game where you unleash your inner battlemage. Master elemental magic to fit your playstyle and cast powerful spell combinations to dominate other players across the Hollow Lands. Available now with cross-play, cross-party, and cross-progression on PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and GeForce Now. Learn more at https://playspellbreak.com

Join the Spellbreak community:
Discord: https://discord.gg/spellbreak
Instagram: https://instagram.com/playspellbreak
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playspellbreak
Facebook: https://facebook.com/playspellbreak
